alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 02 at 5:43PM MST until September 02 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 543 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gold Canyon, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Gold Camp, San Tan Village Mall, San Tan Valley, Seville, Freestone Park, Florence Junction and Queen Valley. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 156 and 160, and between mile markers 165 and 181. US Highway 60 between mile markers 174 and 221. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 148 and 172. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
